subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby delivered a goal and an assist to get the better of a quiet Alex Ovechkin in their first matchup as division rivals, and the Penguins beat the Capitals, 4-0.
snippet: Sidney Crosby delivered a goal and an assist to get the better of a quiet Alex Ovechkin in their first matchup as division rivals, and the Penguins beat the Capitals, 4-0.
